error.tokenError: Your session has expired or the token is invalid. Please log in again.
error.authTokenVerificationFailed: Authentication token verification failed. Please re-authenticate
error.tokenExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again
error.blockedByAdmin: Your account has been blocked by the administration. Please contact support for assistance
error.companyAccessWithdrawn: The company has withdrawn access to the account

error.nickNameAlreadyInUse: Unfortunately, this nickname is taken. Please use a different nickname.
error.emailAlreadyInUse: Email address is already associated with an existing account
error.phoneAlreadyInUse: This phone number is already associated with an existing account
error.emailRegisteredAsCompany: This email is already registered under a Company account. Please sign in to proceed with driver registration
error.phoneRegisteredAsCompany: This phone is already registered under a Company account. Please sign in to proceed with driver registration
error.saveFailed: An error occurred while saving your data. Please try again.

success.driverCreated: Driver account has been created successfully.

error.driverNotFound: The requested driver could not be located.
error.emailExistsWithAnotherAccount: This email is linked to another account. Please choose a different email.
error.phoneExistsWithAnotherAccount: This phone is linked to another account. Please choose a different phone.
error.cannotGoOfflineWithActiveTrip: You can't go offline while you have an active trip in progress. Please complete the trip first.

success.driverAccountUpdated: Driver account has been updated successfully

emailDocumentUnderReviewConetnt.driverRegistrationUnderReview: Thank you for registering as a driver with us. Your driver profile is currently under review. Once approved, you will receive an email notification and be able to log in. We appreciate your patience.

error.unableToFetchDetail: Unable to retrieve the details at this time. Please try again later.

error.noActivePlanForTripCreation: Trip creation is not allowed without an active plan. Please subscribe to a plan first.
error.unableToCreateTrip: An error occurred while creating the trip. Please try again later.
error.companyAccessRevoked: Access for the company has been revoked
error.invalidOrNonexistentCompany: The specified company is invalid or does not exist

socket.tripCreatedRefresh: A new trip has been created. Kindly refresh to load the latest information.

success.tripAdded: The trip has been created successfully

error.noActivePlanForTripCreation: Trip creation is not allowed without an active plan. Please subscribe to a plan first.
